name: Booster Raiders: Fun Run Races
description:
Ready, Set... Boost! Choose your favourite Halfbrick character and compete against other players from all over the world in real-time multiplayer races. Booster Raiders is the newest game from the makers of Jetpack Joyride, Dan the Man and Fruit Ninja.

Gather and challenge your friends, unlock characters, track your progress upgrading it and unlocking new attacks and items; jump, boost and shoot your items with strategy. Get ready for the most epic real-time multiplayer race and run throughout fun and colorful environments from other Halfbrick games!

CHARACTERS
●Barry Steakfries from Jetpack Joyride and Monster Dash.
●Scientist from Jetpack Joyride.
●Dan from Dan The Man.
●Josie from Dan The Man.
●Mari from Fruit Ninja series.
●Rory from Bears vs Art.
●The King from Raskulls.
●Flash the Cyberdog from Jetpack Joyride.
●Zombie T-Rex from Age of Zombies.
●Sensei from Fruit Ninja series.

FEATURES
● Compete against players from all the world in real-time multiplayer races.
● Run at Super Sonic Speed through colorful and exciting racing tracks.
● Progress and climb the Raiders Road hill unlocking new characters and rewards.
● Choose between your favorite Halfbrick characters.
● Complete epic quests to win awesome rewards.
● Crazy game modes as lap races or surviving the UFO.
